# Industrial IoT
### Industry 3.0 Vs Industry 4.0
![i](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Alexander_Zureck/publication/327130483/figure/fig2/AS:769763521347588@1560537333709/Interaction-between-hierarchies-Levels-in-Industry-30-and-Industry-40-source.png)
## **Cheap** approach to convert to Industry 4.0
1. **Example 1 : Electromagnetic Flow meter**

2. **Example 2: Meter**      
    
[![](https://mermaid.ink/img/eyJjb2RlIjoiZ3JhcGggVERcbkEoKERlbHRhLU1ldGVyKSk6OjpjbGFzczEtLT58UlM0ODV8IEIoW1Jhc3BiZXJyeSBwaWUgM10pXG5CIC0tPnxSSjQ1fCBDW1BDXTo6OmNsYXNzNCAtLT58TVFRVCBDb0FQfCBEWyhJb1QgQ2xvdWQpXTo6OmNsYXNzNVxuQjo6OmNsYXNzMyAtLT58TVFRVCBXRUJTT0NLRVR8RCAtLT4gQ1xuRSgoRW5lcmd5KSkgLS0-QVxuRigoQ3VycnJlbnQpKSAtLT5BXG5mKChWb2x0YWdlKSkgLS0-)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#/edit/eyJjb2RlIjoiZ3JhcGggVERcbkEoKERlbHRhLU1ldGVyKSk6OjpjbGFzczEtLT58UlM0ODV8IEIoW1Jhc3BiZXJyeSBwaWUgM10pXG5CIC0tPnxSSjQ1fCBDW1BDXTo6OmNsYXNzNCAtLT58TVFRVCBDb0FQfCBEWyhJb1QgQ2xvdWQpXTo6OmNsYXNzNVxuQjo6OmNsYXNzMyAtLT58TVFRVCBXRUJTT0NLRVR8RCAtLT4gQ1xuRSgoRW5lcmd5KSkgLS0-QVxuRigoQ3VycnJlbnQpKSAtLT5BXG5mKChWb2x0YWdlKSkgLS0-)
![](https://5.imimg.com/data5/FV/JW/MY-10701065/delta-power-meter-500x500.jpg)
> #### Similarly companies can setup these cheap IoT upgradation to there Industry 3.0 devices
> * To make them more efficient
> * Setup multiple of these devices to all the areas of need 
> * Hence they will be able to monitor all the data from a remote place
